channel.title: eDk Mix Sessions .: THE ARCHIVES ::
channel.itunes:subtitle: Let's destroy the boundaries between styles
channel.itunes:author: Eddie K

item.title: eDk·44 // TW!ST
item.description: Almost 18 months without an update - wow! I hope there are still some people following my podcast, because i've got something special for you. This here, is the final eDk Mix Session. Not to leave on a flat note though, this is also by far the BIGGEST mix I've ever attempted. Inside you'll find a progressive selection of tracks flowing from Electro, to Techno, to .. well you'll have to listen to find out! For full tracklist and other future releases please check out: http://soundcloud.com/psyEDk/tw1st +++ ATH0 Lets do this. Let's destroy the boundaries between styles.. _ ::psy/OPs.== http://facebook.com/psyOPs.BASS
item.dc:creator: Eddie K

item.title: eDk|043
item.description:
Mixed live from the Kiss FM studios in Melbourne. We've got a flowing twisty mix of melodic, tekky, haunting, minimal, uplifting, & HARD Trance all up in this mix. Enjoy!

( 60mins | 136 - 141bpm )

· Paul Miller pres. Meli - The First one
· Jonas Stenberg pres. Sunstate - Nightfall (Rough Mix)
· Eric Sneo - Sugar Baby (DJ Preach Remix)
· Cowboy Mike - Fractured (Victor Dinaire Remix)
· Peppelino & Fer BR - Feelings
· Tempo Guisto, Imagin - Snitch (Dope Hat Mix)
· David Moleon - Sabeone
· John Askew - Vandalism (Joint Operations Centre Remix)
· Mark Young & Derek Jones - Vengeance (Neal Thomas Remix)
· BK & Anne Savage - Testify
· Mauro Picotto - Iguana 2004
· Scott Attrill - Get To It
· Scot Project - F2 (Zorastras Mvm Remix)
· Nick Sentience - Kinetic
· K90 - Malaya (New Wave Mix)
· Joe E vs. Vandall - Isolation

item.title: eDk|042
item.description:
Let's kick it up a notch! Starting with deep dirty twisted TechTrance, this mix flows through TekDance, straight up rolling Techno, HardDance, and HardTrance all whilst retaining a bangin industrial vibe. And for something different, this time we finish up with Drum&Bass.

( 60mins | 137-167bpm;) )

· JK Walker pres. Anti Matter - On Edge
· Neal Scarborough & Gary Maguire - As You Are (Bjorn Akesson Remix)
· David Moleon - No Control
· Paul Miller vs. Ronald De Foe - Abre Los Ojos
· Organ Donors - Mach2 (Shusei & Ryoji Takahashi Remix)
· Talla 2XLC feat. Skysurfer - Terra Australis
· Indecent Noise - Cross The Line
· Will Rees - Alkaline
· Peppelino & DJ Link - Undercover Junkies
· Paul Webster - Cut Off (Will Atkinson Remix)
· Organ Donors - Go
· Soul-T vs. Karpe-DM - Oceans (Nomad Remix)
· Brent Sadowick - Our Puppet
· Jordan Suckley - Out Cold
· Apex - Nowhere To Run
· Hybrid - Know Your Enemy

item.title: eDk|041
item.description:
More melodic & uplifting than usual, this mix captures the rolling percussive tekky style i love - but brings more feeling and atmosphere to the mix.

( 60mins | 135-141bpm )

· Tempo Giusto - Hypnotized (Setrise pres. Techstr Remix)
· 2ND Phase - Steam
· David Moleon - Nonstop
· Neal Scarborough & Gary Maguire - Nibiru (Jordan Suckley Remix)
· Brisky 7 Digital Nature - Excelsior (Lee Haslam Remix)
· Peetu S - Footprints (After The Sunset Mix)
· Ilya Soloviev - Echo (Bryan Kearney)
· Will Atkinson - Cloud Surfing (Joe E's Trancefuzed Remix)
· Future Disciple - Risen
· Tom Colontonio pres. Artexx - Serious Truth (Marcos Remix)
· John Miller - Viper
· DJ Thera & Stana - Necessary Evil
· XGenic - Daylight (Jonas Hornblad Remix)
· Bryan Kearney & Liam Melly - The Other Half (Thr3shold Remix)
· John O'Callaghan feat. Low-Fi Sugar - Never Fade Away

item.title: eDk|040
item.description:
As the weeks pass and my podcast episodes grow in number, i find myself wanting to make each one better than the last - be it through more inspired track selection, improved mixing skill, or even just the overall sound quality.

It gets to the point where i just can't keep out doing myself week after week, so in the interest of focusing my energy on other projects, this 40th episode marks the end of weekly mixes and the beginning of fortnightly mixes.

( 66 mins | 136-140bpm )

· Jason Speed - Across The Waves
· Chris & Matt Kidd - Cherry Picker
· Organ Donors - Mach2
· Evol Waves - Name Is The Answer
· DJ Eddie K - Wynd
· Gary Maguire - True Colours
· John O'Callaghan - Striker
· Steve Noxx & Stu Grady - Musica
· Peppelino - Earthquake
· Whirloop - Feel The Effect (Timpa Remix)
· XGenic - Sensitive
· Simon Patterson - Always
· Greg Downey - Send The Gods
· Talla 2XLC vs. Sean Tyas - Heart To Heart (Sean Tyas Mix)
· Charlie G feat. Trinity - Unbreakable (Dark By Design Mix)

item.title: eDk|039
item.description:
Another rocking mix to get you through the week!
Tekky synths, rolling beats, and uplifting melodies building into a peak-time TechTrance monster.﻿

( 1 hour | 135-141bpm )

· Chemical Brothers - Elektrobank
· Peppelino - The Army
· Disco Hooligans - No Judgement
· Des McMahon & 3clipse - Someday
· Joey V feat. Hyper - We Control
· Jerome Baker - Saved
· Brent Sadowick & Sdk Project - The Drums (Sadowick & SDK Re-work)
· David Moleon - Natillas Monster
· Frontline - Halfway House (Peetu S Remix)
· Kaeno & Denzo - Cabin Pressure
· Organ Donors - The Drum (Audiowarp Mix)
· John Askew - Vandalism (Joint Operations Centre Remix)
· The Third Man - Bit Patteron
· Vicky Devine - War Of Souls
· Tom Colontonio - Nighthawk

item.title: eDk|038
item.description:
The set from my guest mix live from Kiss FM Studios in Melbourne.
Rolling techno grooves driven by twisty hypnotic melodies and dirty basslines, giving way to uplifting trance synths and tweaky acid riffs.

( 1 hour | 136-140bpm )

· Gleave - Come With Me (SVD Stripped Edit)
· Future Disciples - 28 Tracks Later
· Wyrys & Giacomo Stallone - Aretha
· Jeff Mills - The Bells
· Kamui - Werkzeug
· Indecent Noise - Aerospark (Gary Maguire Remix)
· Dave & Oliver - Reality (Liquid Vision Rework)
· Will Rees - Drop Acid
· Matt Everson - Heist Manoeuvre (Nick Sentience Remix)
· Chris & Matt Kidd - Obsessive (Peetu S Remix)
· Des McMahon - Rain Maker
· Audiowarp - Goatic
· Adrenaline Dept. - The Melbourne Shuffle
· Mark Sherry vs. Dr Willis - Celcius 39

item.title: eDk|037
item.description:
This episode is one downright dirty twisty Tech-Trancer. Not for the faint hearted!
Rugged beats and crunchy basslines give way to lush melodies and epic peaks, taking the mix in directions you least expect.

( 1 hour | 134-141BPM )

· Marco V & Ali Wilson - Kaos Theory
· Roman Zawodny - Freak-Musique
· Timmy & Tommy - Shake It
· Ummet Ozcan - Shamballa (Mem Mix)
· Peppelino & Fer BR - Feelings
· DJ Misjah - Mrs Microwave
· Tigran Oganezov - Global Kontr0ll3r (Haywire Mix)
· Dart Rayne vs. Moonphaze - Black & White
· Peppelino - Escape
· Will Atkinson - Liquid Summer
· Indecent Noise - Run To The Sun
· Ehren Stowers - Repilicator
· John O'Callaghan And Kearney - Exactly
· Vicky Devine - Shape Up

item.title: eDk|036
item.description:
Starting with a BANGER from WAY BACK, this mix eases you into the trip with some smooth Psy before beginning the back and forth between driving Tech and uplifting Trance!

· Arrakis - The Spice (New Club Mix)
· Dualsnug - 400,000 Stars Edit 2008
· Matt Everson - Heist Manoeuvre (Nick Sentience Remix)
· Wyrus & Dastin - Countershock
· Greg Downey - Grudge Match (GD vs. JOC Remix)
· Karanda feat. David Calls - On Hole (Mark Sherry's Outburst Remix)
· Jason Speed - Wireless
· Future Discuple - 28 Tracks Later
· Simon Patterson - Strip Search
· Nick Sentience feat. Nick Rowland - Meridian
· Audiowarp - Rise Of The Bezerk
· Mallorca Lee - Then She Waved (Will Atkinson Midnight Remix)
· Indecent Noise - Aerospark (Spark Mix)

item.title: eDk|035
item.description:
From the June 22nd show. Going deeper underground with a strong techy sound, this 60min TechTrance mix rises and falls with lush uplifting Trance melodies and phat driving Techno beats.

· Taras Bazeev - Sahara
· The Advent - Re Creations (Chris Liebing Remix)
· Will Gold - Chicago Shuffle (Alex Losy Remix)
· Rank 1 & Jochem Miller - The Great Escape
· Indecent Noise & Steve Allen - Momentum (Marcos Remix)
· Med vs. Neil Bamford - Stolen (Paul Miller Remix)
· Ex-Driver vs. Simon Patterson - California Us (LarSson & Lucas Comes Bootleg)
· Med vs. Neil Bamford - Light Up (Indecent Noise Remix)
· Audiowarp - GoaTic
· Fallout Boy - Hallucination Generation
· Chris & Matt Kidd - Outbreak
· Omega Drive - The Techno Artillery Brothers
· Technikal & Steve Hill - Impulse (Mds & Spherical Remix)
· Dave The Drummer & Chris Liberator - Untitled A Side
· Laura May - Empathy (Indecent Noise Spark Remix)

item.title: eDk|034
item.description:
This week's mix is something special! Every second track is PsyTrance, and seamlessly woven in between each track is a progressive blend of Tech-Trance, Prog, Hard House, and Epic Uplifting Trance.

· Andy Mcgirr & Mark Doc - Fall Out (Alan Wyse Remix)
· PsyCraft - Memory Flash
· Greg Downey - Show Time
· Chromosome - Vaporized and Confused
· System 7 - High Plains Drifter
· Protoculture - Dawn Razor
· Andy Farley & Sam Townsend - Xchange & Mart
· Domestic vs. Pixel. vs. Unison - Big Time
· Joey V - Max Relax (DJ Choose Remix)
· Ovnimoon - Kundalini of The Andes (Open Your Mind)
· Terrafusion - Numen-Martis
· Crystal Sound - Cillium
· Sneijder - Warsaw
· Suria - Hallucinogirl

item.title: eDk|033
item.description:
60 minutes of Bangin Beats and Epic Trance Anthems, once again showcasing the hottest TechTrance sounds of the underground!


· Timmy & Tommy - Repercussions
· Adam Beyer - Antistius
· Evol Waves - 2012
· Karanda - Shuffle (Mark Eteson pres. Standard Procedure Remix)
· Will Atkinson & Nick Callaghan - Until Next Time (Lee Haslam Remix)
· Darren Morfitt & Dart Ryme - Inglorius Basterds
· Alan Wyse - Future Sound
· Chris & Matt Kidd - Compulsive
· Sneijder - Warsaw (Arctic Moon Remix)
· Gary Maguire - One Way (John Askew Remix)
· Dave & Oliver - F1 (Thr3shold Remix)
· Future Disciple - 28 Tracks Later (Scott Attrill Remix)
· Terrafusion - Numen-Latiaris
· Tom Colontonio - Subdued (Mike Nichol Remix)
